channel.title: Questions on Techtaste
channel.description: Recent content in Questions on Techtaste

item.title: Questions
item.description: $ Do you any framework for go apps or just go's standard library? $ Whats base image for all your go application? $ * Is there performance team? * SLO, SLA who decides? * whats the deployment strategy do u use? * People are migrating to it from slack? * Do you have disaster recovery feature in place?
